description: The project seeks to develop a full-size grant proposal for submission to GEF funding which will enable South Africa to address the policy, financial, information and technological barriers that block the widespread introduction of more energy efficient

subproject.description: This project aims to reduce electricity demand due to households appliances, and in so doing also reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by developing and implementing S&L programs for 12 appliances. The project will also help overcome the barriers which are impeding the widespread uptake of efficient appliances.
subproject.title: PIMS 3277 CC PDF B  Appliances

title: PIMS 3277 CC PDF B:  Appliance Labeling and Standards
